login.loginDescription: Enter your email below to login to your account
login.signUpDescription: Create your account by entering your email and password below

bugReport.modalDescription: Please provide detailed information about the bug you've encountered. This will help us resolve the issue more quickly.
bugReport.title: Title
bugReport.titleParagraph: Provide a clear and concise title for the bug.
bugReport.severityParagraph: How severe is this bug affecting the system?
bugReport.descriptionParagraph: Provide a detailed description of what the bug is.
bugReport.stepsPlaceholder: 1. Go to... 2. Click on... 3. Observe that...
bugReport.stepsParagraph: List the steps to reproduce this bug.

modal.title: Select a Kin
modal.description: Your available Kins are listed below. Select one of them and start chatting, or create a new Kin to fit your needs.
modal.create: Create and configure a new Kin

chat.title: Start a new chat with your Kin {name}
chat.error: I apologize, but I'm not sure how to help with your request.

infos.title: Basic Information
infos.paragraph: Configure the basic settings for your Kin.
infos.name: Kin Name
infos.nameP: This is how your Kin will identify itself.
infos.descriptionP: Brief description of your Kin's purpose.
infos.roleP: The primary role of your Kin.

settings.title: Advanced Settings
settings.paragraph: Fine-tune your Kin's capabilities and behavior.

capabilities.title: Capabilities
capabilities.webP: Allow Kin to search and browse the internet.

memory.title: Memory settings
memory.typeP: How your Kin remembers past interactions.

test.title: Test your Kin
test.paragraph: Try out your Kin's responses before deploying.
